    • Constructor Detail

      • RewardEconomyEvent

        public RewardEconomyEvent(java.lang.Integer _id,
                  WinType _winType,
                  java.lang.Double _amount)
        Constructor for RewardEconomyEvent.

        This event is triggered at the end of a minigame automatically and can be cancelled if no rewards are to be issued.
        Parameters:
        _id - The ID of the arena involved in this event.
        _winType - The WinType of the arena involved in this event.
        _amount - The amount of money to be paid out to each winning player.
